oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reflection positivity in simplicial gravity
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schrader, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematical Physics
81T08 (Primary), 81T25, 83C27 (Secondary)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Within the context of piecewise linear manifolds we establish reflection positivity with a Hilbert action given in terms of the Regge curvature and a cosmological term. Using this positivity a Hilbert space for a quantum theory is constructed and some field operators and observables are given. The set-up allows to introduce time reversal though no time exists. All constructions are non-perturbative.
